description: This file defines the SettingsRepository class that manages persistent application settings, specifically a high-contrast accessibility flag, using Android's DataStore Preferences. It provides methods to read and write this setting as a Flow and suspend function respectively.

classes.name: SettingsRepository
classes.description: A class that manages persistent storage of app settings, currently supporting a high-contrast accessibility toggle.

methods.name: highContrastEnabled
methods.description: Returns a Flow<Boolean> that emits the current state of the high contrast setting, defaulting to false if not set.

methods.name: setHighContrastEnabled
methods.description: Suspended function to persist the high contrast enabled state in DataStore.
